Recommendations: 1. The institution may revisit the MMSU Code to integrate new provisions attuned to the challenges of globalization and ASEAN integration towards the attainment of its Vision, Mission, Goals, and Objectives.
2. The College may endeavor to produce a separate College Manual lifted from the University Code.
3. The College is encouraged to establish international linkages and networking where faculty members can engage in professional growth.
4. The conduct of relevant academic activities to improve the practices towards the attainment of the university Vision to be one of the best universities in the world may be sustained.
